website_summaries.verdict: A fast, inexpensive dSLR with better-than-average low-light quality, the Pentax K-x nevertheless has some flaws, such as unreliable image stabilization, to watch out for.
cons: Doesn't display AF points in viewfinder

customer_reviews.title: Pentax K-x DSLR
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one used and am completely satisfied. As far as I'm concerned this is one of the good ones. There are many online reviews and if you want an oldie but goodie see if you can locate one. Being able to use many Pentax lenses is just a real plus for me. Mine came with two lenses in the original box with all the goodies. I've since bought another Pentax but this one is my main camera.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - looks good in white
customer_reviews.text: I had/have many digital cameras but for the short time I tried this one, it is a keeper. The settings and menues are nice - the low light quality is great. Even the lens is great - especially for being a "kit" lens. The color (I have the white one) is great - very different and makes it look smaller and less scary than regular DSLR. It is light, small, fits well in hand, controls are at the right positions, it has live view and sensor image stabilization that works well. A great, great camera - especially for people new to DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Alex BB

customer_reviews.title: wish i was as good at composing as this thing is at taking...
customer_reviews.text: anyway, this thing is awesome and i get compliments everywhere i take it. don't let your jealousy prevent you from purchasing this fine-a piece of equipment. i also purchased theand it is not only filled with awesome, it is AWESOME. recommend both. now i just need to take a DSLR class....rather, i need my wife to take a DSLR class! lol (right)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Smith

customer_reviews.title: My first dslr and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera a few months ago and I'm very satisfied and happy with it, I'm very amateur in photography but I think this was the best choice to start. Pros: I love the small size you can even use it with one hand only, the appearance is very cool, remarkable low-light performance, the price was very reasonable, a lot of nice features. Cons: I found the auto-focus function very slow with the live view mode on. The HD video is noisy in low-light situations. But over all I love this camera and I recommend it as a first dslr camera.
customer_reviews.author: Golo

customer_reviews.title: Rebirth of the old
customer_reviews.text: I still have my old Pentax Kx camera body which I purchased in 1977 as my first SLR. This camera has seen a lot of mileage and went through several hundred rolls of film over the years. The new Pentax K-x is the rebirth of the old trusty camera. I got the "Star Wars" edition which carries attention wherever I go. I am very pleased with this entry-level camera body, even after owning it for several years and comparing it to my more advanced Canon cameras. The built-in stabilization is a great asset when using some of my old Pentax lenses and the performance with my new Tamron lenses is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Flywheel

customer_reviews.title: Nice starter
customer_reviews.text: I am not a picture person. I have never been the "point and shoot in my pocket at all times" kind of girl. I did decide that taking photographs might be something I could get into, however. I chose this camera for some features it has over others in the lower price range (mp, in-camera filters, LV). I haven't even gotten around to ordering the rechargeable batteries yet b/c the first set just died after something like 1200 pictures. This camera has not disappointed. I am already aware of the weakness of the kit lense, but that will be the next thing I decide to spoil myself with. Any recommendations for a macro/portrait kind of shooter?
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: Good condition! I am overall pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I wish about this camera is that it used something other than AA batteries. But there’s not much that can be done about that! Otherwise the camera is absolutely perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekkah Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: We have had this camera now for over 3 years and have taken thousands of photo's. We absolutely love it. Not only is it nice to look at but it takes great pictures and great videos (in good light).
customer_reviews.author: RAH

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great camera
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this camera. I've had it about a month and I'm still learning all the cool features. It takes great high res images. I love the fact that I can adjust the brightness of a photo with just a simple dial. The handle on the side makes it easy to carry in your grip. It does rapid shot and you can snap a "demo" photo to test out the lighting before you take the actual photo. I take a lot of product photos (macro) and it does a GREAT job! I love my Pentax K-x camera! It's great to have a SLR again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful camera. Takes all film version lens which is wonderful. Couldn't be more pleases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5-Stars All The Way
customer_reviews.text: As a novice photographer at best, this is the perfect camera. Are there better cameras out there? Of course. With more options? You bet. But this has everything I need and more. Just nice everyday pictures. I'm not making money with this thing, I'm just using it to take pictures. Gotta love the "Storm Trooper White" color scheme as well. I get so many comments on just the color. Add a couple more lenses at you're set!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deal-E-O

customer_reviews.title: My New Pentax
customer_reviews.text: I'm a loyal Pentax person, thanks to my dad - this thing is really cool. Obviously the way it looks is sweet - but it is a serious little camera too. I'm sure it will be outdated by the time I finish this review - but hey - you can't beat time!
customer_reviews.author: HG Marks

customer_reviews.title: basic review
customer_reviews.text: Just got mine today and I am super happy with it so far. Some pictures seem a little blurry but that's probably my lack of skill and will probably improve over time. 720p video recording is a big plus in this price range! Lots of extra built in goodies such as filters to change picture colors, hdr pictures, lots of different scene modes, so much I can't even describe it all. If you plan on only having the body and a semi compact lens, and and sd card or 2 and some extra batteries a good basic bag is the lowepro mini topload holster.
customer_reviews.author: CT0123

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera! More than satisfied! The screen is normally on for just a few seconds so battery life is extremely good - most often 2000-3000 shots per set of batteries. Viewfinder is excellent, too, especially in sunny conditions. The viewfinder can be adjusted to provide sharp viewing even for users of eyeglasses. The camera can be used in a simple way and still give good pictures. Additional features of the camera can be used as the user's skill and understanding increases. The white version looks great and stays cool in bright sun.
customer_reviews.author: photograph

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: everything is great could have used at lest some of the instruction book with it
customer_reviews.author: John Eades

customer_reviews.text: I love this camara. The only thing is that the shutter is a bit noisy to be close to the objetive we want to take a picture a bit close and go unnoticed. Nice cámara for a principiant, to get used with a reflex.

customer_reviews.text: In short, awesome camera. Have used Sony's and Nikons before, this bowls them over. Canon DSLR have nicer depth perceptions in outdoor situattion at lower ISOs, but the clarity of picture taken by this think is simply mind blowing. You cannot lose with this. More updates coming soon...
customer_reviews.author: AudioFreakwency

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am well pleased with this camera. Picture quality is very good and it is user friendly. I would recommend it to anyone interested in a DSLR, regardless of price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Pentax K-X vs Canon T1i
customer_reviews.text: For a first DSLR this is a great camera! Its direct competitor in my opinion would be the T1i. However with a much lower price point and very similar features, this seems to be the better buy. Overall it looks great, works very well and is lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cowle

customer_reviews.title: Just got mine... and I can't put it down!
customer_reviews.text: After a LOT of research, I settled on the K-x. The price, features and ease were what attracted me to it. And I haven't been disappointed so far. Clicked about a 200 pictures this week, battery life is still full. Found it great for taking pictures of my niece (a feisty 3 year old who runs amok) with the image stabilizer. Easy functions, all of which I can operate with one hand.

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera i've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: This Camera is amazing, definitely the best entry level Dslr on the market, by far! it's light weight, stylish, easy to use, while also having advanced features, such as the in camera processing, which spares you from purchasing such software, i highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedyy.lynn

customer_reviews.text: Great camera.. Efficient controls and quick adjustments on the fly.Struggling with the short battery life and it's hard to completely recommend the camera because of it.

customer_reviews.title: Pentax K-x DSLR
customer_reviews.text: This top consumer rated entry level DSLR is everything I hoped it would be...perfect for me.

customer_reviews.title: tedlw70

customer_reviews.text: Extremely good looking camera from Pentax. Love the design, colour and funcionality! A good buy to en excellent price. Pricewinning camera here in Norway.
customer_reviews.author: Vegard

customer_reviews.title: Pentax K-x
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner such as myself I find this camera to have everything I need. Many people told me I would need a canon or Nikon, but this is a great camera. Stylish too in white.
customer_reviews.author: R. Knight

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: As a girl who want to have a beautiful DSLR, this one is a really good choice for me. It is not too big. It has a fancy design and a really nice color. What's more, it is easy to use and can help you take high-quality photos. To be honest, since we are not professional photographers, we do not really need very good DSLRs. Therefore, why not buy a nice-looking one?
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but some bad copy's
customer_reviews.text: After reading a lot about the camera I ordered it at Amazon and was very pleased with the appearance and the overall quality. However after looking at the first pics I was very disappointed. The majority are blurred and just not sharp in the 100% views. I spend dozens of hours and tried all kind of different settings but couldn't ever get really good picture quality. Maybe I just had one of the copies that had shutter induced blur problems - I guess so. Anyway, I finally ended up returning the camera - very disappointing. I would have loved this camera. If you are lucky and get a good copy, it is a really awesome camera!
customer_reviews.author: alias

product_meta.title: Pentax K-x 12.4 MP Digital SLR with 2.7-inch LCD and 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 AL Lens (White)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Choose a camera that redefines the entry-level digital SLR category. The Pentax K-x offers high-end features including Live View, HD video and photographic performance that challenges higher class models. Since there’s no rule that SLR cameras must come in one color, try the K-x in a choice of white or black, as well as special, limited edition red and navy. With a one-handed shooting design that is extremely compact, lightweight, and easy-to-use, the very affordable K-x is perfect for users stepping up from a point-and-shoot digital camera to their first digital SLR. 

Pentax K-x Features & Highlights 

High-resolution 12.4-megapixel CMOS image sensor features sensor-shift Shake Reduction for stabilized image and video capture up to 4 stops max. 

Large 2.7-inch LCD features Live View with contrast, phase difference, and Face Detection autofocus (up to 16 faces). 

Capture widescreen HD video in full 720p resolution (1280x720) at 24fps cinematic framerate, using any Pentax 35mm lens. 

Highly compact DSLR body design allows for 1 handed operation and comfort when travelling. 

Powerful automatic modes, including Pentax Auto Picture and scene modes, ensure the perfect shot in any situation, while helping new photographers learn DSLR photography. 

Creative processing and filter modes produce high quality finished images, while offering the ability to explore artistic freedom through unique special effects. 

True HDR image capture blends 3 bracketed images into a single picture with outstanding shadow, highlight, and midrange detail. 

Fast 4.7fps capture speed and 1/6000 second maximum shutter speeds are possible with the Pentax PRIME II image processing engine. 

Responsive 11-point wide-angle SAFOX VIII autofocus system focuses quickly and accurately, and can easily track moving subjects. 

Capture up to 1900 shots with universally available, easy-to-find AA lithium batteries (also compatible with AA NiMH rechargeable and alkaline batteries). 

Expanded ISO range covers sensitivities from 100-12800 for extreme low light photography. 

What's in the Box


 * USB Cable I-USB7 
 * Strap O-ST53 
 * Hotshoe Cover FK 
 * Eyecup FQ 
 * Body Mount Cover 
 * Software CD-ROM S-SW99 
 * AA Lithium Batteries (x4)
